Name: Origin
RewardText: ['Origin', 'In the end, it was the torch of science that illuminated that era akin to a quagmire.\\nThe new furnace is now ablaze, forging a future of boundless possibilities and hopes for gold-like humanity.']

Name: Teachings
RewardText: ['Teachings', 'One by one, the ocean routes weave an ever-beating heart,\\nconnecting Kowloong to the world of splendor.']

Name: Paradigm
RewardText: ['Paradigm', 'Our cause is dedicated to the distant future,\\nwhere the truest honor... lies in the legacy we leave for generations to come.']

Name: Proverbs
RewardText: ['Proverbs', 'Years later, as future generations pen epitaphs for that era,\\nthey will lament its nobility and greatness, heaving sighs over the pettiness and cowardice.']

Name: Mourning
RewardText: ['Mourning', '...Greetings, Qu, ID: 5784221930.\\nYou have been recognized as dead and are therefore permitted to participate in the Tabula Akasha project.']

Name: Heritage
RewardText: ['Heritage', 'In the course of history, the past holds sway over the present,\\nbut in the recording of history, the present shapes the understanding of the past.']

Name: Flexibility
RewardText: ['Flexibility', 'Born without purpose, perpetuated by frailty, and dead by chance...\\nThis reflection encompasses not only myself but also humanity, and now chance approaches.']

Name: Revision
RewardText: ['Revision', 'If it only entails reigning over remnants and data...\\nWhat purpose does immortality serve...']

Name: Prologue
RewardText: ['Prologue', 'Dedicated to those who have passed and can no longer share their stories.\\nMay they forgive me for not seeing everything, not remembering everything, and not predicting everything.']
